attributes.action: Give Class D License Holders Class C1 and Class C License Holders D1 Entitlement
attributes.additional_details:
Making these changes would encourage drivers of different classes to working in areas not previously open to them with out additional costly training.

A Class D driver can drive a vehicle twice the weight of a Class C1 at present.
attributes.background:
Give Class D License Holders Class C1 Entitlement and Class C License Holders D1 Entitlement.

I Propose that Class D(PCV) License Holders should be given Class C1(7.5t LGV) entitlement.

And that Class C(LGV) License Holders should be given CLass D1(minibus) entitlement.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718662
